github_commits.author: Rahul Sharma
github_commits.message: Scaling improvements - Performance optimization and database connection pooling.
github_commits.lessons_learned: Permanent errors getting masked are harder to diagnose if we don't have proper logging. Need to add more detailed logging at the database layer.
github_commits.bug_related: This commit directly addresses the issue of Permanent errors getting masked by adding enhanced logging around database interactions.

github_commits.author: Priya Verma
github_commits.message: Added metrics dashboard for API response times.
github_commits.lessons_learned: We need to monitor the health of our RabbitMQ queues - slow message processing could be masking errors.
github_commits.bug_related: Potential correlation between slow RabbitMQ queue processing and Permanent errors getting masked.

slack_conversations.thread_title: Discussion about Scaling - API Performance & RabbitMQ

messages.author: Rahul
messages.text: Yaar, Scaling pe kaam karna hai! API response times hain slow.  Dekho, users se complaints aa rahe hain.

messages.author: Priya
messages.text: Haan bhai, main dekh rahi hoon.  Database connection pool check kar rahi hoon.  Possible bottleneck hai.

messages.author: Amit
messages.text: Theek hai, let me check the code.  RabbitMQ queues bhi dekhunga.  Slow message processing issue hai kya?

messages.author: Neha
messages.text: Arrey, ye issue production mein aayega kya?  Users ko irritation hoga.

messages.author: Rahul
messages.text: Nahi yaar, testing mein catch kar lenge.  Testing mein sab check karenge.  Testing mein sab sahi hoga.

messages.author: Amit
messages.text: Okay, I've added some metrics to monitor the API response times. Let's see if we can identify any bottlenecks.

slack_conversations.key_decisions: Decision to implement a metrics dashboard for API response times and monitor RabbitMQ queues.
slack_conversations.warnings: Warning: Permanent errors getting masked could be due to slow API responses or RabbitMQ queue processing. Need to investigate thoroughly.
slack_conversations.bug_clues: Rahul mentioned 'irritation hoga' - this suggests a potential user impact related to the Permanent errors get masked.

jira_tickets.title: Implement Scaling - API Performance & RabbitMQ Monitoring
jira_tickets.description: Detailed description of Scaling work - Optimizing API response times and implementing monitoring for RabbitMQ queues to prevent message processing delays.  Address potential Permanent errors get masked.  Focus on improving user experience.
comments: Update 1: Initial investigation shows slow API response times.
Update 2: RabbitMQ queues are also experiencing delays.
jira_tickets.bug_connection: Directly related to Permanent errors get masked - slow processing could mask the root cause.

confluence_docs.title: Scaling - API Performance & RabbitMQ Monitoring
confluence_docs.content: Markdown content about Scaling - API Performance & RabbitMQ Monitoring.  Key considerations include API response times, RabbitMQ queue health, and logging.  Important: Permanent errors get masked can be a significant issue if not addressed proactively.
confluence_docs.author: Sneha Patel

google_docs.title: Sprint 3 Planning - Scaling & Performance
google_docs.content: Meeting notes about Sprint 3 Planning - Scaling and Performance. Key action items: Arjun to investigate API response times and RabbitMQ queue health. Priya to implement metrics dashboard. Rahul to add detailed logging.
decisions_made: Implement a metrics dashboard for API response times.
Monitor RabbitMQ queues for slow message processing.
google_docs.bug_mentions: Referenced Permanent errors get masked - a critical concern discussed during the meeting.
